title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, December 12, 2021
description: "Be regular and orderly in your life so that you may be violent and original in your work." -- Gustave Flaubert, born on this day in France, 1821. Best known for “Madame Bovary”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Be regular and orderly in your life so that you may be violent and original in your work." -- Gustave Flaubert, born on this day in France, 1821. Best known for “Madame Bovary”
